homepageDescription: Access thousands of Igbo words, audio pronunciations, and example sentences to power the future of Igbo technology.
featuresDescription: Existing as an open-source project, the Igbo API aims to change this by making the process of learning Igbo more accessible to the Nigerian diaspora and beyond.
Each word is provided with at least one: Each word is provided with at least one definition.
Certain words are accompanied by context: Certain words are accompanied by contextual examples
Diacritics are used to convey the differ: Diacritics are used to convey the different tones present in the Igbo language.
Nsịbịdị is writing system was created in: Nsịbịdị is writing system was created in Nigeria.
Proverbs are a core aspect of the Igbo l: Proverbs are a core aspect of the Igbo language.
The Igbo language has many dialects, som: The Igbo language has many dialects, some words capture this nuance by providing variant spellings.
With each API key, you will get 2,500 re: With each API key, you will get 2,500 requests per day.
Enter a word in either English or Igbo t: Enter a word in either English or Igbo to see it's information
Want to see how this data is getting use: Want to see how this data is getting used? Take a look at
The Igbo API is the most robust, Igbo-En: The Igbo API is the most robust, Igbo-English dictionary API that is maintained by our wonderful volunteer community.
Interested in what you see? Register for: Interested in what you see? Register for an API Key!
